text: The prime minister of the Portuguese Republic () is the head of the country's Government. ==List== === Constitutional Monarchy – Second Liberalism (1834–1910) === # Portrait Name Term of office — Electoral mandates Political party Government Monarch 1 Pedro de Sousa Holstein, Marquis of Palmela 1834 1835 Chartist/"Chamorro" 1st Dev.
